2021-10-24T20:59:48Z: And that's all from us! We'll see you in two weeks' time for the Mexican Grand Prix - as we enter the final five races.
2021-10-24T20:59:15Z: Here's the race report, if you fancy reliving that thrilling US GP: https://www.autosport.com/f1/news/f1-united-states-gp-verstappen-holds-off-hamilton-charge-for-victory/6708799/
2021-10-24T20:53:09Z: Shaquille O'Neal is delivering the trophy in a longhorn-adorned car. You know, the usual.
2021-10-24T20:45:25Z: That was an event to savour, wasn't it? Verstappen now leads the standings by 12 points, as Hamilton cuts the arrears with the fastest lap.

2021-10-24T20:39:38Z: What a battle between the two current F1 titans - Perez completes the podium and finishes third.
2021-10-24T20:39:25Z: Raikkonen, with an injured Alfa Romeo after his spin, is overtaken by Stroll on the final lap to see the Aston Martin driver move up to 12th place at the finish.
2021-10-24T20:38:48Z: Hamilton doesn't get DRS down the back straight, and Verstappen holds on - and wins the United States Grand Prix!
2021-10-24T20:37:52Z: It's the final lap - but Verstappen begins it by getting DRS off the lapped Schumacher!
2021-10-24T20:37:03Z: Hamilton brings the gap down to 1.1s with two laps to go, struggling at the start of the next lap but manages to cut it down to 0.8s!
2021-10-24T20:35:00Z: Bottas, meanwhile, has tried a number of moves on Sainz - but the Ferrari remains unmoved.
2021-10-24T20:34:15Z: But Hamilton responds, bringing the gap back down to 1.5s on that previous lap! Just a bit of respite?
2021-10-24T20:34:07Z: Ah, Vettel is handed 10th place as Raikkonen spins off at Turn 6. The Finn is able to continue after a rumble over the grass and gravel but that has wrecked his race as he drops to 12th place behind his team-mate.
2021-10-24T20:32:41Z: Vettel gets the move on Giovinazzi done, taking 11th around the outside under braking at Turn 12. He is now going after former team-mate Raikkonen who holds the final points place.
2021-10-24T20:32:15Z: Verstappen's opened the gap by a tenth on the previous lap, stalling Hamilton's progress for the time being. Perhaps Hamilton's been charging up, or maybe he's taken too much from the tyres.

2021-10-24T20:29:05Z: The gap, however, with five laps left now sits at 1.5s.
2021-10-24T20:28:18Z: The turbulence from Verstappen's Red Bull is beginning to play with Hamilton in the opening sector now, reducing the Mercedes' drivers progress. Verstappen's been told to focus on his corner exits if DRS comes into play.
2021-10-24T20:28:04Z: Stroll becomes the latest driver to be shown the black and white flag - this time it is for track limits. He'll need to be careful for the rest of the race or face a time penalty.
2021-10-24T20:26:09Z: Hamilton closes out lap 48 by bringing the gap down to 2.1s now, but the pace margin he has over Verstappen is reducing with every lap.
2021-10-24T20:24:42Z: Vettel is up to P12 and edging towards Giovinazzi ahead of him. 1.3s split the pair, with a lot of other battles on hold as drivers manage tyre life to ensure they can reach the finish with a flourish.
2021-10-24T20:22:16Z: 10 laps remaining - and the lead gap is down to 2.8s.
2021-10-24T20:20:59Z: The Ricciardo-Sainz battle appears to have cooled, as Bottas is now closing on the Ferrari driver.
2021-10-24T20:20:58Z: Raikkonen's hunt of Tsunoda has cooled off during the 'getting out of the way of the leaders' phase, with the Finn now two seconds behind. 10 laps to go.
2021-10-24T20:20:34Z: Verstappen's pushing to try and re-open the gap to Hamilton, setting a personal best, but Hamilton's still half-a-second quicker on lap 45. It's a 3.4s gap.
2021-10-24T20:18:13Z: At the end of lap 43, the Verstappen-Hamilton gap now stands at 4.4s.
2021-10-24T20:15:34Z: Mazepin has been shown the black and white flag, with Raikkonen given the same flag seconds later. It'll most likely be a warning for ignoring blue flags.
2021-10-24T20:14:58Z: Sainz has a look at Ricciardo down at the back straight, but the McLaren driver holds on to fifth for the time being.
2021-10-24T20:14:05Z: It's a 1m38.485s for Hamilton on that lap, nearly 2s faster than Verstappen. Gap is 6.2s.
2021-10-24T20:12:43Z: Vettel proved to be a stumbling block for Hamilton in the opening sector, but after lapping him, the Mercedes driver guns it in the last sector to cut the gap to 8.1s.
2021-10-24T20:12:09Z: And here comes Vettel for his second stop, on lap 39, duly coming out in 13th place, with time to chase down Giovinazzi and company in front.
2021-10-24T20:09:07Z: Vettel is the only driver yet to pit for a second time in this race. He's ninth currently and if he pits now should come out around P13 and in the train for the final points places led by Tsunoda.
2021-10-24T20:08:57Z: So, Verstappen's now out 8.8s ahead of Hamilton. No more stops, and Hamilton can put pressure on with fresher boots.
2021-10-24T20:07:36Z: Here we go - Hamilton comes in for his second stop. Fresh hard tyres to see out the race with a nice, swift stop.
2021-10-24T20:04:55Z: Stroll duly pits on lap 35 to allow Tsunoda to move up to P10. Raikkonen remains in DRS range right behind him.
2021-10-24T20:03:26Z: Raikkonen on a bit of a charge this afternoon as he fills the mirrors of Tsunoda in a fight for ninth when the Aston Martin drivers pit. He did win here in 2018, let's not forget.
2021-10-24T20:03:17Z: Bottas stops from fifth place, returning to the circuit in seventh ahead of Norris.
2021-10-24T19:59:23Z: Leclerc comes in from third now, lifting Perez up to third as the Red Bull driver clocks a 1m39.566s.
2021-10-24T19:58:56Z: Into the bulk of the second pitstop cycle now as Russell and Raikkonen make their stops on lap 32.
2021-10-24T19:57:31Z: McLaren double-stacks, covering off Sainz with Ricciardo - but Norris's attempts to get closer to his ex-team-mate was scuppered with a slightly slow stop.
2021-10-24T19:56:24Z: Perez also pits for second time, putting on a fresh set of hard tyres after going double-medium to begin with.
2021-10-24T19:55:58Z: Sainz pits for a second time, but it's a little bit glacial for the Ferrari tyre as the rear-right is slow on. Ricciardo gets the call to pit now as a result.
2021-10-24T19:54:46Z: Alonso pits on lap 29 and comes out 1.5s ahead of Giovinazzi. Is Part III of their mighty battle incoming?
2021-10-24T19:54:22Z: Verstappen comes in for his second stop, bolting on new hard tyres to relinquish the lead to Hamilton for the time being.

2021-10-24T19:51:58Z: Giovinazzi, who was quickly coming under pressure from Vettel, has been given a breather by being pitted for a second time. The Italian comes out on hard tyres in P15 on lap 28.
2021-10-24T19:50:23Z: We have a Virtual Safety Car period as a marshal picks up debris from the track.
2021-10-24T19:49:45Z: Right behind the epic new Drive to Survive-style Alonso vs Giovinazzi rivalry, Vettel pulls off a super move on Russell around the outside of Turns 16-17-18 for P13.
2021-10-24T19:49:44Z: At the end of lap 26, Hamilton chopped another 0.6s out of Verstappen's lead - but the Dutchman has now stepped up the pace.
2021-10-24T19:48:38Z: In fifth place, Ricciardo is trying to keep Sainz at bay. The gap between the pair is 1.5s, as Ferrari and McLaren fight for every point on offer.
2021-10-24T19:48:15Z: A lap later Alonso gives it another go at Turn 12 and this time it is the Alfa Romeo driver who goes off the track to keep the position. So it is roles reversed as the Italian is forced to give 11th place to his rival.
2021-10-24T19:47:01Z: Hamilton was a full second faster than Verstappen on that previous lap now - the gap stands at 3.4s. It's hotting up once more.

2021-10-24T19:44:02Z: Hamilton's making hay once more, cutting the gap down to 4.7s on the last lap as Verstappen had an iffy lap. Tyre management, or is degradation beginning to bite?

2021-10-24T19:37:18Z: And there's Stroll into the pits a lap later, as he returns to the action in P15 behind team-mate Vettel. The earlier flashpoint between Alonso and Raikkonen has been deemed not worthy of a stewards investigation.

2021-10-24T19:34:06Z: That elderly statesman battle between Alonso and Raikkonen at Turn 1 has been noted by the stewards. Raikkonen still has the position for now.

2021-10-24T19:26:24Z: Hamilton now comes in, so he'll presumably come out behind Verstappen.

2021-10-24T19:23:06Z: Verstappen clears Ricciardo with DRS, while Hamilton does not choose to respond to his title rival and remains on track.
2021-10-24T19:22:53Z: The first pitstop cycle is in full flow as Norris and Gasly also pit and both switch to the hard tyres.
2021-10-24T19:21:27Z: Verstappen tries to force Hamilton's hand and pits, hoping to claim the undercut! Hard tyres for the Red Bull driver.
2021-10-24T19:21:17Z: Tsunoda, who started on the softs, pits on lap 10 to take on hards, with Russell switching his mediums for hards at the same time.

2021-10-24T19:17:43Z: Norris has now finally dispatched Sainz for sixth place, having got close to doing so at the start.
2021-10-24T19:17:02Z: Russell, now 13th after Ocon pitted with damage, leads the full power unit change trio with Vettel and Alonso directly behind him. That is until Alonso pits on lap eight in an attempt to undercut those ahead of him.
2021-10-24T19:15:09Z: Red Bull has Verstappen and Perez to use tactically in this race, Mercedes has just Hamilton. The strategists will be working overtime to try and unpick this battle.

2021-10-24T19:02:44Z: Verstappen leads the field to the grid, ready for the start. Deep breath, now...
